snippet: At a church service in Albany, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was joined by Mayor Bill de Blasio, in town for the New York State Black, Puerto Rican, Hispanic and Asian Legislative Caucus Weekend.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo is joined by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio for New York State Black, Puerto Rican, Hispanic and Asian Legislative Caucus Weekend in Albany; de Blasio strikes conciliatory note with other mayors in state, saying all children deserve full-day prekindergarten; remarks are response to barrage of emails accusing him of favoring New York City children over those in cities like Niagara Falls and Yonkers.
lead_paragraph: At a church service in Albany, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was joined by Mayor Bill de Blasio, in town for the New York State Black, Puerto Rican, Hispanic and Asian Legislative Caucus Weekend.

headline.main: De Blasio Strikes Conciliatory Note on Pre-K
headline.print_headline: Mayor Strikes Conciliatory Note on Pre-K
